code: import{ALERT_CLEAR,ALERT_ERROR,ALERT_SUCCESS}from"../../types";export var alertSuccess=function alertSuccess(message){return{type:ALERT_SUCCESS,payload:{message:message}};};export var alertFailure=function alertFailure(message){return{type:ALERT_ERROR,payload:{message:message}};};export var alertClear=function alertClear(){return{type:ALERT_CLEAR};};
